text: How do you know you're crazy? She asked Alice. To begin with, the cat replied, dogs are not crazy. - I'm going to get it. I guess not, said Alicia. "Well, then", continued the cat, "you'll notice that dogs growle when they don't like something, and they move their tails when they're happy. But I groan when I'm happy and I wave my tail when I'm angry: then, I'm crazy. FIN
title: Lógica
author: Lewis Carroll
